children.label: Eligibility Criteria for Wegovy™ (semaglutide)
children.outcome: Authorization for Wegovy™ (semaglutide), may be approved when all of the criteria are met

children.label: Used with a reduced-calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management in adults.
Initial body mass index (BMI) should be either:
≥27 kg/m2 (overweight) in the presence of at least one weight-related comorbidity (e.g., hypertension, type 2 diabetes mellitus, or dyslipidemia)
Wegovy will not be coadministered with other semaglutide-containing products or with any other GLP-1 receptor agonist
